title: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 seconds and the closing speed should not exceed 0
clause_text: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 seconds and the closing speed should not exceed 0.25 m. / sec.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The time of an automatically closing door should be minimum 5 seconds and the closing speed should not exceed 0.25 m. / sec.
